title: Update contact details in the Contact section

requirements.text: Update the contact details displayed in the ContactSection component (studio address, phone number, email, and any other contact info fields) to the new values provided by the user in the next message. Keep the existing layout, styling, and form intact — only the displayed contact information text should change.

quotes: Please change the contact details to what i say

acceptanceCriteria: The ContactSection displays the user-specified contact details (address, email, phone, or other fields as provided).
All existing form fields (name, email, message) and submit button remain unchanged.
The AuraFlora pastel styling and layout of the contact section are preserved.
No other sections are affected by this change.

constraints: Only update the contact information text values — do not alter the contact form logic, styling, or layout.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Redesigning the contact section layout or form.
Adding new form fields or backend form submission logic.
Changing any other section of the website.
